name: Go Team Yeah
description:
Go Team Yeah is a team brawler game for 2-4 players. choose your character, gamemode and level and jump into the action!

To play, download the GoPAD controller app for your smartphone:

GoPAD for ANDROID: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.itanicangopad

GoPAD iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/go-pad/id103985196...

Ensure your device is running on the same wifi network as Go Team Yeah.

Full Gamepad support will be added at a later date.

To Play Brawl Mode:

Everyone for themselves! Jump from platform to platform and try to stomp your adversaries. First player to 5 kills wins!

To Play Team Machine Mode:

It's Reds Vs Blues. Stomp your adversaries to collect energy, then throw it into your machine. The Machine will make a bomb that you can then drop into your adversaries machine. First team to destroy their opponents machine wins!

Collect powerups to improve your chances of success.
